cs.OS, cs.DC, cs.DB, cs.AR, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the role of file systems in data-centric computing, which involves processing data near the storage device. This topic is closely related to operating systems (cs.OS), data-centric computing (cs.DC), and databases (cs.DB). Additionally, the paper mentions the use of non-volatile memory (NVM) and storage class memory (SCM), which are topics in computer architecture (cs.AR) and systems (cs.SY).
